agendaDownloadText: Download the agenda with the schedule of talks and workshops
faq1: When and where is the event?
faq1r: The event is going to be from august 16th to 19th, 2023, in the Buenos Aires Convention Center (CEC)
faq2: How can I get tickets to the Ethereum event?
faq2r: You can buy tickets at https://welook.io/t/ethereum-argentina.
faq3: I am new to Ethereum, Can I participate?
faq3r: Absolutly! Our agenda contemplates talks for beginners and Web 3 experts. Everyone who want to participate and are interested in the Ethereum ecosystem and would like to learn more, independently in the previously knowledge
faq4: What to do in Buenos Aires?
faq4r: We want that your visit to Buenos Aires be a total experience. Here you can find information.
faq5r: In this link you will find Ethereum Argentina's side events.
